::Decadel::

      Decadel arrived at Maximal City.

      "........Autogun=
s......" Decadel said to himself.

      He transformed to sea-worm mode, a=
nd dug deep underground, then popped up at the entrance, and made a dash in=
side Maximal City.

      "Exterior defenses outwitted...." Decadel complim=
ented himself.

      Fortunately, for Decadel's sake, he erased all remain=
s and signatures and stuff of being a Predacon.  He hated Predacons.  He ha=
ted all the factions out their, really.  Decadel would fake being a Maximal=
.  He walked around, looking for somebody to greet him........Whether they =
would welcome him warmly like a long-lost friend, or tell him to fuck off, =
would determine how much he hated them, and how long till he used one of hi=
s worms to enslave somebody....

       "Hello?  Anybody here?  Can somebod=
y please tell me what faction this is and stuff?" Decadel asked aloud, wait=
ing to see if anybody heard him and would come.



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=

~~~~~~~LurkerAbyss~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper Of Souls~
~=
The Shadow Of The Dark~
~I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
